short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Suggests a related article for most of the English-language Wikipedia articles you visit.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Wikipedia Article Recommender will suggest a related article for most of the Wikipedia* articles you visit. It will also suggest randomly chosen articles with a personalized level of probability that is based on your historical suggestion-following propensity.

Article suggestions will be display next to the title of the current article.

Privacy Policy:
If a first-run opt-in is accepted, this add-on will send the current chance of a random article suggestion to the developer's server after every suggestion-applicable Wikipedia article is loaded. The data that is sent will include only a randomly generated unique identifier and the aforementioned probability value. The transmitted data will not contain personally identifiable information, and it will not be used for commercial purposes.

* Currently, only the English-language Wikipedia is supported.
